background: The manufacturer is looking to determine the optimal combination of various alloys to produce a specified total quantity with certain target components at minimal cost.
constraints: The total quantity of alloys produced is exactly AlloyQuantity
The quantity of each target component in the alloy must be met or exceeded
The quantity of component k in alloy m must adhere to the specified Ratio
objective: Minimize the sum of the costs of the alloys used in the production
description: The manufacturer wishes to find the amounts of the various alloys needed and to determine the cheapest combination given \param{AlloyQuantity}, the total quantity of alloy to produce, \param{Target}, the quantity of target components in the alloy, \param{Ratio}, the ratio of each component k in alloy m, and \param{Price}, the price of each alloy k.

parameters.definition: Quantity of target components in the alloy
Ratio of each component k in the alloy m
